item.title: Apple Watch Series 11 review: stuck in the middle
item.description: No one is going to wax lyrical about the Apple Watch Series 11. Not because it’s a bad smartwatch - it’s a great smartwatch, actually. There’s just nothing that makes it feel special this year. Alas,

item.title: The best fitness trackers and watches we’ve tested
item.description: Fitness trackers have come a long way from the simple bands that tracked steps and little else. Modern trackers can monitor everything from your heart health to how well you’ve recovered from a hard b

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 is stuck in a familiar orbit
item.description: If last year’s Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 was tried and true, this year’s Galaxy Watch 8 is a bit more like tried and fine. This isn’t overtly bad. Most smartwatch newbies will be delighted by the $349.99
